name: Smoke On The Water
desc:
We all <input type="text" value="" data-result="came" /> out to Montereax,
On the Lake Geneva shoreline.
To make records with a <input type="text" value="" data-result="mobile" />,
We didn't have much <input type="text" value="" data-result="time" />.
But Frank Zappa and the Mothers,
Were at the best <input type="text" value="" data-result="place" /> around,
But some stupid with a flare <input type="text" value="" data-result="gun" />,
Burned the place to the <input type="text" value="" data-result="ground" />.
Smoke on the water and fire in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="sky" />.
Smoke on the water...

They burned down the gambling <input type="text" value="" data-result="house" />,
It died with an <input type="text" value="" data-result="awful" /> sound.
(Uh) Funky Claude was <input type="text" value="" data-result="running" /> in and out,
Pulling kids out the <input type="text" value="" data-result="ground" />.
When it all was <input type="text" value="" data-result="over" />,
We had to find another <input type="text" value="" data-result="place" />.
But Swiss <input type="text" value="" data-result="time" /> was running out,
It seemed that we would <input type="text" value="" data-result="lose" /> the race.
Smoke on the water and fire in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="sky" />.
Smoke on the water...

We ended up at the Grand Hotel.
It was <input type="text" value="" data-result="empty" /> cold and bare.
But with the Rolling truck Stones thing just outside,
Making our <input type="text" value="" data-result="music" /> there.
With a few red <input type="text" value="" data-result="lights" />, a few old beds,
We made a <input type="text" value="" data-result="place" /> to sweat.
No matter what we <input type="text" value="" data-result="get" /> out of this,
I know I know we'll never <input type="text" value="" data-result="forget" />.
Smoke on the water and fire in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="sky" />.
Smoke on the water...
